com.iver.utiles.save
Class SaveEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      com.iver.utiles.save.SaveEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SaveEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

Event which indicates that a file is going to be saved, or has been saved.

Author:
Pablo Piqueras Bartolomé (pablo.piqueras@iver.es)
See Also:
BeforeSavingListener, AfterSavingListener, Serialized Form
